response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you better. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
